EmailTemplate.name: Certification Reminder
EmailTemplate.Body:
$recipient.displayableName, The certification "$certification.name" is still open and needs to be completed.#if ($certification.expiration) This certification must be finished by $spTools.formatDate($certification.expiration,3,1).#{end} Please login to IdentityIQ to complete your work.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $!comment --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sincerely, $sender.displayableName
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for reminding a certification owner that they have a certification waiting for them to complete. This is an "instant" email sent on demand from the certification dashboard components. See EmailBean and Emailer.compileOpenCertEmail for context.

Argument.name: certification
Argument.Description: The Certification object we are reminding someone about.

Argument.name: recipient
Argument.Description: The Identity object of the user being reminded.

Argument.name: sender
Argument.Description: The Identity object of the user doing the reminding.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Reminder: Certification needs your attention
